Author: daintyyeo
Text: i'm so sorry you have/had to go through something like this as well :(

Author: hotcheeto01
Text: yes it wasn’t till i was older that i started to realize that i went they ed phases. i can now remember summers when i was like 11 years old (maybe even younger) when the only thing i thought about was calories and i’d squeeze my thighs until they bruised. then i remember when i started eating fast food everyday and my body blowing up. then i just go back to the restricting. it was frightening watching my ed grow to where it is now and think back and realize that i didn’t even realize it was happening. i always thought i knew what ed’s were and never understood how someone couldn’t kno they had one when i have for at least half of my life and hadn’t known for most of it.   i don’t understand how i wouldn’t HATE HAVING IT when it’s really taken up so my life. but it’s like become the one thing in my life that i do love having even though i hate how it’s shaped me? don’t kno if this makes sense
